meanings.definition: The quality or state of being indecisive.
meanings.sent1: Her indecisivenesses often lead to delays in completing tasks.
meanings.sent2: His indecisivenesses about which movie to watch frustrated his friends.
meanings.sent3: The indecisivenesses of the squirrel trying to choose between two acorns was quite comical.
meanings.sent4: The indecisivenesses of the storm clouds made it hard to predict the weather.
meanings.sent5: The indecisivenesses of the toddler in the toy store made for a long afternoon.

meanings.definition: The inability to make a decision.
meanings.sent1: The indecisivenesses of the committee resulted in no progress being made.
meanings.sent2: She struggled with indecisivenesses when choosing a flavor of ice cream.
meanings.sent3: The indecisivenesses of the cat trying to catch a laser pointer dot was amusing to watch.
meanings.sent4: The indecisivenesses of the traffic light caused confusion among drivers.
meanings.sent5: His indecisivenesses in picking a gift made shopping a challenging task.
